page.title: 15Drayton
page.content: Drayton shopping area extends approximately 450m along the Havant Road. There are 56 shops and services - 15 on the North side, 41 on the South side. There are 19 different types with foodshops being the greatest in number. The garage is used the most with approximately 2000 customers daily. Thursday, Friday and Saturday tend to be the most popular shopping days, with lunchtime being the busiest time. Most shops open from 9.00 a.m. to 5.30 p.m. The average number of staff is 6. The post office is visited by most shoppers particularly during lunchtimes and on Thursdays, pension day for the elderly people.
